scripts.build: yarn build:es5 && yarn build:es6 && yarn build:ts && yarn build:libdef
scripts.build:libdef: dts-generator --project ./ --out typings/index.d.ts --prefix @qiwi/substrate/target/es5 --name @qiwi/substrate --main @qiwi/substrate/target/es5/index && libdeffix --dts=./typings/index.d.ts --prefix=@qiwi/substrate/target/es5 && flowgen typings/index.d.ts --output-file flow-typed/index.flow.js
scripts.testgen: cp typings/index.d.ts src/test/ts/libdef/index.d.ts && rsync -a ../types/src/test/ts/libdef/I*.ts ./src/test/ts/libdef/ && rsync -a ../abstract/src/test/ts/unit/*.ts ./src/test/ts/unit/ && rsync -a ../std/src/test/ts/unit/*.ts ./src/test/ts/unit/
scripts.test: yarn testgen && yarn dtslint && yarn jest
